inclusion.criterion: diarrheal stools considered to be antibiotic associated
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: history of recurrent C diff infections
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patient with other known gastrointestinal disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients receiving tube feeding or fecal incontinence prior to receiving antibiotics
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 55yo woman with h/o ESRD on HD and peritoneal dialysis who presented with watery, non bloody diarrhea and weakness.
